Texts.Chs: 在^orange;采集工作台^reset;处制造^orange;1个采矿头盔^reset;并带给^green;韦尔奇^reset;
Texts.Eng: Craft a ^green;Mining Helmet^reset; at a ^orange;Foraging Table^reset; and return to ^green;Welchie^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 现在你可以把它戴在你的头上旅行而不需要拿着手电筒！此外，我还在存储中发现了一些^orange;玻璃^reset;。你为什么不带上呢？
Texts.Eng: Now you'll be able to slap that on your head and travel without needing to hold a flashlight! Also, I found some ^orange;Glass^reset; in storage. Why don't you take it?

Texts.Chs: 有时，黑暗会成为可怕的障碍。为了在这漂泊，你可以在^orange;采集工作台^reset;处制作^orange;采矿头盔^reset;。现在就去制作一个。
Texts.Eng: Sometimes, the darkness can prove a horrible hindrance. For just such a time, you can craft a ^orange;Mining Helmet^reset; at a ^orange;Foraging Table^reset;. Craft one now.
